member.name: T:TouristAgencyAPI.Models.Customer
member.summary: Represents a customer with personal details and contact information.

member.name: P:TouristAgencyAPI.Models.Customer.Id
member.summary: Unique identifier for the customer.

member.name: P:TouristAgencyAPI.Models.Customer.FirstName
member.summary: Customer's first name.

member.name: P:TouristAgencyAPI.Models.Customer.LastName
member.summary: Customer's last name.

member.name: P:TouristAgencyAPI.Models.Customer.Email
member.summary: Customer's email address (must be unique).

member.name: P:TouristAgencyAPI.Models.Customer.Phone
member.summary: Customer's phone number.

member.name: P:TouristAgencyAPI.Models.Customer.Address
member.summary: Customer's full address.

member.name: P:TouristAgencyAPI.Models.Customer.DateOfBirth
member.summary: Customer's date of birth.

member.name: P:TouristAgencyAPI.Models.Customer.CreatedAt
member.summary: Date and time when the customer was created.

member.name: P:TouristAgencyAPI.Models.Customer.UpdatedAt
member.summary: Date and time when the customer was last updated.

member.name: T:TouristAgencyAPI.Models.Destination
member.summary: Represents a tourist destination with details like name, description, country, city, price, and duration.

member.name: P:TouristAgencyAPI.Models.Destination.Id
member.summary: Unique identifier for the destination.

member.name: P:TouristAgencyAPI.Models.Destination.Name
member.summary: Name of the destination (e.g., "Paris Adventure").

member.name: P:TouristAgencyAPI.Models.Destination.Description
member.summary: Detailed description of the destination and what it offers.

member.name: P:TouristAgencyAPI.Models.Destination.Country
member.summary: Country where the destination is located.

member.name: P:TouristAgencyAPI.Models.Destination.City
member.summary: City where the destination is located.

member.name: P:TouristAgencyAPI.Models.Destination.ImageUrl
member.summary: Optional URL to an image of the destination.

member.name: P:TouristAgencyAPI.Models.Destination.Price
member.summary: Price of the destination in the local currency.

member.name: P:TouristAgencyAPI.Models.Destination.Duration
member.summary: Duration of the destination experience in days.

member.name: P:TouristAgencyAPI.Models.Destination.CreatedAt
member.summary: Date and time when the destination was created.

member.name: P:TouristAgencyAPI.Models.Destination.UpdatedAt
member.summary: Date and time when the destination was last updated.
